argumentText:
Observe that $x^m [x,y]^k$ is conjugate to both $x (x^{m-1} [x,y]^k)$ and to $(y^{-1} x^m [x,y]^{k-1} xy) x^{-1}$, hence by one has

$${\ell({ x^m [x,y]^k })} \leq \frac{{\ell({ x^{m-1} [x,y]^k })} + {\ell({ y^{-1} x^{m} [x,y]^{k-1} xy })}}{2} + { \frac{3}{2} c}.$$

Since $y^{-1} x^{m} [x,y]^{k-1} xy$ is conjugate to $x^{m+1}[x,y]^{k-1}$, the claim now follows from #P_main_l2.8.
